author: sky.cactus
content: We could really use an "official" maintainer of the EIP Ruby code: <https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3787>

author: sky.cactus
content: By "official" here I just mean someone that we generally trust to review code and ensure that things generally work and someone isn't injecting security vulnerabilities into the page.
